Class Crop

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Crop
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
    A crop that will grow from an unripe crop to a ripe crop that can be harvested by either farmer or Player into food.
    Author:
    weijianlai

      • tick

        public void tick(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location location)
        This method is override from its parent class, Ground class. It will be called once per turn that will experience the joy of time. It will increase the tick and counter by 1 each turn by adding the age of the crops. If the crop is the same as the mature age of the crop which is 20, it will then turn into a ripe crop and change the displayChar to V. It uses the ItemCapability to determine if the crop is RIPE or UNRIPE. When the crop is UNRIPE, the itemCapability will be in UNRIPE state.
        Overrides:
        tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the Ground
